casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George Earl GOODE, Jr. No. 10A94-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 27, 2006. Lisa Miles, Mark Montgomery, Durham, Diane M.B. Savage, for George Earl Goode, Jr. Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of April 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Response to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 19th day of May 2006 to file and serve his/her response with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of April 2006."
